name: NSIDC SMMR-SSM/I Nasateam sea ice concentration
description: Passive-microwave estimates of sea ice concentration at 25km spatial resolution. Daily and monthly resolution, available from 1-Oct-1978 to present.

name: NSIDC SMMR-SSM/I Nasateam near-real-time sea ice concentration
description: Passive-microwave estimates of sea ice concentration at 25km, daily, near-real-time resolution.

name: NSIDC passive microwave supporting files
description: Grids and other support files for NSIDC passive-microwave sea ice data.

name: Nimbus Ice Edge Points from Nimbus Visible Imagery
description: This data set (NmIcEdg2) estimates the location of the North and South Pole sea ice edges at various times during the mid to late 1960s, based on recovered Nimbus 1 (1964), Nimbus 2 (1966), and Nimbus 3 (1969) visible imagery.

name: Artist AMSR-E passive microwave sea ice concentration
description: Passive-microwave estimates of daily sea ice concentration at 6.25km spatial resolution, from 19-Jun-2002 to 2-Oct-2011.

name: Artist AMSR-E passive microwave supporting files
description: Grids and other support files for Artist AMSR-E passive-microwave sea ice data.

name: Artist AMSR2 near-real-time passive microwave sea ice concentration
description: Near-real-time passive-microwave estimates of daily sea ice concentration at 6.25km spatial resolution, from 24-July-2012 to present.

name: Artist AMSR2 passive microwave supporting files
description: Grids for Artist AMSR2 passive-microwave sea ice data.

name: CERSAT SSM/I sea ice concentration
description: Passive microwave sea ice concentration data at 12.5km resolution, 3-Dec-1991 to present

name: Smith and Sandwell bathymetry
description: Global seafloor topography from satellite altimetry and ship depth soundings

name: NOAA Optimum Interpolation 1/4 Degree Daily Sea Surface Temperature Analysis
description: Sea surface temperature at 0.25 degree daily resolution, from 1-Sep-1981 to present

name: NOAA Optimum Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature V2
description: Weekly and monthly mean and long-term monthly mean SST data, 1-degree resolution, 1981 to present. Ice concentration data are also included, which are the ice concentration values input to the SST analysis

name: NOAA Extended Reconstructed Sea Surface Temperature V3b
description: A global monthly SST analysis from 1854 to the present derived from ICOADS data with missing data filled in by statistical methods

name: Ssalto/Duacs gridded absolute dynamic topography
description: Gridded sea surface heights above geoid from satellite altimetry (delayed and near-real-time products)

name: Ssalto/Duacs gridded absolute geostrophic velocities
description: Absolute geostrophic velocities computed from gridded sea surface heights above geoid from satellite altimetry  (delayed and near-real-time products)

name: Ssalto/Duacs gridded sea level anomalies
description: Gridded sea surface height anomalies from satellite altimetry  (delayed and near-real-time products)

name: Ssalto/Duacs gridded mean and climatological sea level anomalies
description: Monthly mean and monthly climatologies of gridded sea surface height anomalies from satellite altimetry

name: GSHHG coastline data
description: A Global Self-consistent, Hierarchical, High-resolution Geography Database

name: Polar environmental data layers
description: These layers are climatological and other summary layers that may be useful for purposes such as general modelling, regionalisation, and exploratory analyses

name: Oceandata MODIS Aqua Level-3 binned daily remote sensing reflectance
description: Daily remote-sensing reflectance from MODIS Aqua. RRS is used to produce standard ocean colour products such as chlorophyll concentration

name: Oceandata SeaWiFS Level-3 binned daily remote sensing reflectance
description: Daily remote-sensing reflectance from SeaWiFS. RRS is used to produce standard ocean colour products such as chlorophyll concentration

name: NASA MODIS Rapid Response Antarctic Mosaic
description: Daily Antarctic MODIS mosaic images at 4km resolution

name: CSIRO Atlas of Regional Seas 2009
description: CARS is a digital climatology, or atlas of seasonal ocean water properties.

name: NCEP-DOE Reanalysis 2 6-hourly data
description: NCEP-DOE Reanalysis 2 is an improved version of the NCEP Reanalysis I model that fixed errors and updated paramterizations of of physical processes. The 6-hourly data is the original output time resolution.

name: NCEP-DOE Reanalysis 2 daily averages
description: NCEP-DOE Reanalysis 2 is an improved version of the NCEP Reanalysis I model that fixed errors and updated paramterizations of of physical processes. Daily averages are calculated from the 6-hourly model output.

name: NCEP-DOE Reanalysis 2 monthly averages
description: NCEP-DOE Reanalysis 2 is an improved version of the NCEP Reanalysis I model that fixed errors and updated paramterizations of of physical processes. Monthly averages are calculated from the 6-hourly model output.

name: NSIDC SMMR-SSM/I Nasateam sea ice time since melt
description: Time since sea ice melted calculated from NSIDC SMMR-SSM/I Nasateam sea ice concentration data

name: Artist AMSR2 regional passive microwave sea ice concentration
description: NA

description: NA

name: The International Bathymetric Chart of the Southern Ocean (IBCSO) - digital chart for printing
description: NA

name: RTOPO-1: A consistent dataset for Antarctic ice shelf topography and global ocean bathymetry
description: NA

name: Radarsat Antarctic Mapping Project Digital Elevation Model Version 2
description: NA

name: Oceandata MODIS Terra Level-3 mapped monthly 9km sea surface temperature
description: NA

name: Oceandata MODIS Aqua Level-3 binned daily POC
description: Daily remote-sensing particulate organic carbon from MODIS Aqua.

name: Oceandata SeaWiFS Level-3 binned daily POC
description: Daily remote-sensing particulate organic carbon from SeaWiFS.

name: Oceandata MODIS Aqua Level-3 binned daily KD490
description: Daily remote-sensing KD490 from MODIS Aqua.

name: Oceandata SeaWiFS Level-3 binned daily KD490
description: Daily remote-sensing KD490 from SeaWiFS.

name: World Ocean Atlas 2009
